body: Binders use actual fire, fire spells, protections against cold, and sometimes even fire creatures to keep ice elementals at bay during summoning. An ice elemental often yields to its binder as soon as serious melting occurs.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Binding Outsiders/Outsider Categories/Elementals and Genies/Ice Elemental
name: Ice Elemental
